summary:
Key words: Film production & screenwriting, assessment of higher education, internationalisation & intercultural communication

As a producer of documentaries I have worked with  SAP Film for the past years.  SAP Film represents many years of experience in storytelling as an independent filmmaker about topics that matter such as education, culture, the environment, human relations, health and social issues.

Internationalisation has been my personal and professional passion since I can remember and I have travelled to more than 40 countries on 5 continents. Professionally I was able to develop internationalisation of higher education through ERASMUS, the educational flagship programme of the EU.

In July 2017, I retired as programme director of the Master of Arts in International Communication a joint master offered by the  Geert Hofstede Consortium, a consortium of European Universities all specialized in International Communication Management & PR. It offers a Master in International Communication, its development was made possible through an Erasmus LLL grant. 
Highlights in my career are: Programme director Master & Bachelor in International Communication, Project Manager development of the European Joint Master in International Communication Management, Project Manager development of the Joint Master in Business Studies,  International Coordinator & member of the Management Team of the School of Communication, Media & IT of the Hanze University of Applied Sciences, Groningen, The Netherlands.

Main professional goal was: development of activities of Geert Hofstede Consortium focussed on research and education in international communication & PR within transnational concept of higher education.
Specialties: International projects in higher education, specifically transnational collaboration.

awards.title: Member Ubbo Emmius Colleghie
awards.description:
I was invited to become a member of the advisory college, based on my experience as initiator and organiser of international conferences in Groningen.

"Het Ubbo Emmius Colleghie is een groep van ervaringsdeskundigen van wie verwacht wordt dat zij actief blijven als congresorganisator in Groningen/Noord-Nederland en daarnaast hun expertise beschikbaar stellen aan een ieder die een congres of symposium zou willen organiseren." - www.gcb.nl

awards.title: Honorary Chair
awards.description: After my ten year tenure, the board of the GHC bestowed the honours of an appointment as honorary chair.

projects.title: An Engineer's Odyssey
projects.description: The documentary is a personal portrait of Geert Hofstede.The documentary of 50 minutes is made in the year of his 85 birthday, 2013. In it he tells us about his personal and professional life and reflects on the relationship between the two. He shares with us the experience of a lifetime focusing on the past and including his ideas on the today’s developments.

projects.title: Erasmus Millennials
projects.description: The film follows 5 international students in an Erasmus master programma during their studies from start to finish. What are their expectations, their experience, how do they cope with the frustration? Do their dreams come true? What is their relaionship with their teachers and each other? How do their studies influence their lives?

projects.title: Embracing Uncertainty..learning to use the future to innovate the present
projects.description:
Loes Damhof was voted Dutch Lecturer of the year 2016. 
As such she is the recipient of the first Comenius Scholarship, presented to her by the Dutch government. This award offers her the possibility to develop innovative education according to her vision on education. She has chosen Future Literacy  as focus. 
The film is the personal story of the development of the Futures Literacy as part of the Master Curriculum of the Hanze University of Applied Sciences, Groningen as told by Loes Damhof, project initiator.

profile_positions.description: De Filmvereniging Groningen (FVG) is opgericht in 2020 en wil een spannend en vruchtbare filmcultuur in Groningen ontwikkelen. FVG werkt in nauwe samenwerking met filmorganisaties Fryslan en Drenthe.
profile_positions.title: Voorzitter

profile_positions.description:
SAP Film productions use film to create dialogue about topics that matter such as education, culture, the environment, human relations, health and social issues.

www.sapfilm.nl
profile_positions.title: Producer & Scriptwriter

profile_positions.description:
Quality assessment of Bachelor & Master programmes according to NVAO standards. Assessment of degree programmes in Creative industries, Communication & Media. Specialised in internationalisation of higher education and curriculum development.
For Netherlands Quality Agency, Hobéon, Adviesbureau voor strategische vraagstukken en AEQUI, Evaluatiebureau voor het hoger onderwijs.
profile_positions.title: Assessor of university study programmes

company.name: Hanze University of Applied Science, Groningen

profile_positions.company: Hanzehogeschool Groningen / Hanze University of Applied Sciences Groningen
profile_positions.description:
After initiating and developing the this master programme with an international team, I served as its programme director for 7 years. The programme pioneered in transnational education and offered a joint double degree programme within the Geert Hofstede Consortium. 
The development of the programme was made made possible through ERASMUS LifeLongLearning funding. 

www.masterinternationalcommunication.eu
profile_positions.title: Programme Director Master of Arts in International Communication

profile_positions.company: Geert Hofstede Consortium - MIC Master in International Communication
profile_positions.description:
Geert Hofstede Consortium includes 4 Universities, specializing in international and intercultural communication.
England: Leeds Beckett University
Italy: IULM, International University of Language and Communication
Lithuania: University of Vilnius
The Netherlands: Hanze University Groningen, University of Applied Sciences
After I initiated this consortium for the purpose of close academic collaboration, I became its first chair and held that position for 9 years.

volunteer_experiences.role: Member Of The Board Of Advisors
volunteer_experiences.description: Futures Literacy, developed within UNESCO, is a capability that offers insights on how we approach unforeseeable challenges by using the future to innovate the present (Miller, 2015). One approach to acquiring these skills is through Futures Literacy Labs. These learning by doing/action-research workshops enable participants to reveal, reframe and rethink the assumptions they use to imagine the future.
Stichting Beeldlijn is a foundation the produces films about Northern Netherlands and/or by film makers from the Northern Netherlands. Movies about culture, societal issues and the arts.

The archives of Geert Hofstede have been included as one of the special collections of the library of the University of Groningen. My job is to index the material to make it more accessible for the general public and for researchers.

The Aletta Jacobs foundation was established to support and diversify knowlegde dissemination about the first woman doctor in the Netherlands. Main activities to date: movie (Aletta Jacobs het Hoogste Streven by Nouchka van Brakel) development of an exhibition and educational material.
